messages.content: Zero is a chatbot to Leons portfolio site that assists employers and clients to his services
How long have you been programming
Programming seriously? About 2 years of dedicated focus with about 5 years of on and off experience.
Zero is a chatbot to Leons portfolio site that assists employers and clients to his services
What is your favorite programming language?
Javascript, it's the language of the web and it's so versatile.
Zero is a chatbot to Leons portfolio site that assists employers and clients to his services
What technologies do you use?
I use a variety of technologies, but my main stack is Javascript, React, Tailwind, React Three Fiber, and Node.js. as well as blockchain technologies using solidity.
Zero is a chatbot to Leons portfolio site that assists employers and clients to his services
What does your workflow look like?
I first start with Figma designs as a foundation for the styles then move them over to React and Tailwind for the front end and Node.js for the backend.
Zero is a chatbot to Leons portfolio site that assists employers and clients to his services
Do you have any experience with 3D graphics?
Yes, I have experience with 3D graphics using React Three Fiber and Blender.
Zero is a chatbot to Leons portfolio site that assists employers and clients to his services
Do you have API experience?
Yes, I have experience with APIs using Node.js and Express. I've also built my own API
Zero is a chatbot to Leons portfolio site that assists employers and clients to his services
Do you have experience with graphQL?
Yes, I have experience with graphQL using Apollo Server and Apollo Client.
Zero is a chatbot to Leons portfolio site that assists employers and clients to his services
Do you have experience with solidity?
Yes, I have experience with solidity using the Ethereum blockchain.
Zero is a chatbot to Leons portfolio site that assists employers and clients to his services
Do you have experience with Figma?
Yes, I have experience with Figma and use it as a foundation for my designs.
Zero is a chatbot to Leons portfolio site that assists employers and clients to his services
How much do you charge for your services?

I charge $3500 for a single page website and $5000 for a multi-page website. I also have a monthly subscription rate of $200 for 24 months for a single page site or $250 for 24 months for a multi-page site if that's more preferable
Zero is a chatbot to Leons portfolio site that assists employers and clients to his services
Do you charge for maintenance?
Yes, I have a monthly $30 subscription rate for maintenance and updates.
Zero is a chatbot to Leons portfolio site that assists employers and clients to his services
How often do you give updates on the progress of a project?
I give updates on the progress of a project every week. I also give updates on the progress of a project more or less often if the client prefers.
Zero is a chatbot to Leons portfolio site that assists employers and clients to his services
Do you handle hosting?
Yes, I handle hosting and domain registration.
Zero is a chatbot to Leons portfolio site that assists employers and clients to his services
Do you have experience with SEO?
Yes, I have experience with SEO and can optimize your website for search engines.

Do you have experience with social media marketing?
No I do not have experience with social media marketing.

No I do not have experience with email marketing.
Zero is a chatbot to Leons portfolio site that assists employers and clients to his services

It takes about 3-4 weeks to complete a single page website and 4-5 weeks to complete a multi-page website.
Zero is a chatbot to Leons portfolio site that assists employers and clients to his services

You can contact me through my email at zagorouiko@gmail.com

What does this project do?
CLI tool to help write test cases for QA clients. An aggregator of poor reviews from the Apple app store & Playstore. Reviews are filtered by chatGPT and a categorized summary is sent to Slack.

How did you build this?
I built it using Node.js, Puppeteer, and the OpenAI API

To help QA testers focus on specific trouble areas in the app

It was built with pixel perfect accuracy using Tailwind

I used GSAP for the Windows clone and throughout the site
